speaker: President. –
english:
President. – I will be happy to pass on the suggestion you just made. That could indeed be an efficient way of using our working time.
(The sitting was suspended at 11.40 a.m. and resumed at 12 noon)
original:
President. – I will be happy to pass on the suggestion you just made. That could indeed be an efficient way of using our working time.
(The sitting was suspended at 11.40 a.m. and resumed at 12 noon)
agenda_item: Aid effectiveness and corruption in developing countries (debate)
